title: Healthcare Plan Details
description: Details of a Health Insurance plan provided by an organization.

xdm:ownerID.Title: Owner ID
xdm:ownerID.description: Unique identifier of the Owner of the policy which could be owned by an individual , group or an organization.

xdm:network.Title: Network
xdm:network.description: The insurer-specific identifier for the insurer-defined network of providers to which the beneficiary may seek treatment which will be covered at the 'in-network' rate, otherwise 'out of network' term.

xdm:affiliation.Title: Affiliation
xdm:affiliation.description: An affiliation to a government service, such as the army or navy.

xdm:lastVerification.Title: Last Verification Date
xdm:lastVerification.description: The date on which this plan was last verified.

xdm:cost.Title: Plan Cost
xdm:cost.description: The cost associated to this insurance plan.

xdm:isActive.Title: Is Active
xdm:isActive.description: Indicates whether the plan is active.
